meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into eighteenths for all the guests to have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: She only ate two eighteenths of the pizza, leaving the rest for later.
meanings.sent3: The teacher divided the crayons into eighteenths, causing a colorful chaos in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like it was split into eighteenths, each piece longing for something different.
meanings.sent5: The eighteenths of the rainbow shone brightly after the rain, painting the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: If you add one eighteenths of a cup of sugar, the recipe will be perfect.
meanings.sent2: She had to convert the measurement to eighteenths to match the baking instructions.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear, leaving only one eighteenths of a hat behind.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a whisper, barely audible, just one eighteenths of the volume it used to be.
meanings.sent5: The eighteenths of the hourglass slipped away silently, marking the passage of time.
